title: how do i deal with nunu counter jungle
body: i mean skarner and this makes me cry :~:

replies.body: If you have Nunu constantly stalking you in your jungle a good idea would be to ward the common entrances, smite your wolves etc. If you see him come in, tell your laners to close in on him and he will be free gold, plus the buffs will be yours again.
Get help from teammates.  In solo this can be difficult.
ward your jungle? choose early game junglers? have your lanes come and help you if he is too deep in the jungle?
Nunu win ratio is 58.5% on jungle its too high, Its by far the best jungle actually!
I leave my raptors and wolves with one small creep so he can't take the camps.
